name: jumplist
description: Quickly jump from one point to another, imitating the neovim jump list.

commands.title: Register jump in jump list of given id, id defaults to 0
Jump forward in jump list of given id, id defaults to 0
Jump back in jump list of given id, id defaults to 0

jumplist.combineLineCount.description:
The last jump point is only updated when a new one is registered within this number of lines.
(Requires reload)

jumplist.maximumJumpPoints.description:
Maximum number of jump points stored.
(Requires reload)

jumplist.jumpListCount.description:
Number of parallel jump lists.
(Requires reload)

jumplist.insertJumpPointOnForwardJump.description:
Insert a new jump point at the current location when jumping forward.
(Requires reload)

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
